name: A Thousand Words (aykim)
description:
[Download as Mac or Win application for MUCH BETTER performance :') ]

A Thousand Words is a narrative-based 2D platform game in which the the life and memories behind the owner of the photos (me, the creator) are revealed to the player. Navigating between photos as a tiny person, players will find "Life Memos" that are sticky notes describing the details behind each photo. The timeline order of the photos begin from the good ol' mid-2000's all the way to the present 2022. Play to find out why and how this game was created!

WALK = Left/Right Arrows

JUMP = Up Arrow

FALL THROUGH PLATFORM = HOLD Down Arrow

Created by Angela Yena Kim

Music by Eli Calabrese

CDM 175 Course by Patrick Lemieux
